commit message: Prepare next development version.
Add a shadow for the support title. The support title now casts a shadow on the list view.
Add an icon for the flashlight.
Add a menu action for toggling the flash of the device's camera if supported.
Add an icon for turning off the flash of the device's camera. The action icon works like a toggle button.
Remove hard coded string from menu_color_picker.xml file.
Rename menu_color_picker_flash in menu_color_picker_action_flash for a better naming consistency.
Add an alert dialog asking the user to confirm the deletion of a color item.
Tweak string resource names for a better consistency.
Add a message to notify that a color is successfully saved.
Add french translations.
Add a custom view for DeleteColorDialogFragment with a preview of the color the user is about to delete.
Suppress lint warning InflateParams for the inflation of the fragment view. We don't have any parents to use here.
